General.Name: Imperial Ginseng Products Ltd
General.Description: Imperial Ginseng Products Ltd. cultivates and processes ginseng in the province of Ontario. It is also involved in the sale of dried ginseng to wholesalers through distributors in China. Imperial Ginseng Products Ltd. was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 Dunsmuir Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1L2
